capital-market-subtitle1: Because the capital market rapidly changes and does not promise fixed returns,
capital-market-subtitle3: we aim for limited financing based on our power of information

capital-market-features.title: Proactively reflect market trends
capital-market-features.cons: Information is power in this market, which changes rapidly and proactively reflects trends
capital-market-features.pros: Focus resources only on necessary points through meetings and exchanges with leaders participating in the market

capital-market-features.title: Fluctuation
capital-market-features.cons: Great fluctuation due to macro-, micro- and social factors of the market
capital-market-features.pros: Prepare for fluctuation through short-term operation of products ensuring capital preservation such as CB, BW, etc.

capital-market-features.title: Profitability
capital-market-features.cons: High profits at close range if investment based on accurate analysis line up with market trends and directions
capital-market-features.pros: Quality of profit increased through systematic/non-systematic risk control and short-term fund operation

real-estate-subtitle1: We develop stable and highly profitable products
real-estate-subtitle2: while maximizing the advantages of real estate financing

real-estate-features.title: Uniqueness & individuality
real-estate-features.cons: Real estate PF has uniqueness and individuality as all its projects are different form each other
real-estate-features.pros: Investment structure standardized based on the accumulated know-hows and experiences

real-estate-features.title: Liquidity
real-estate-features.cons: In general, the period of real estate PF investment is 2-5 years; it is vulnerable in terms of financing liquidity
real-estate-features.pros: Investment made by setting the period of investment at around a year, based on deep understanding of the project

real-estate-features.title: Profitability
real-estate-features.cons: The rate of return for real estate PF is higher, compare to that of other financial products
real-estate-features.pros: Higher rate of return on investment achieved through inside information and hegemony unknown to common investors
